sys_ui_page.description:
Full student application. All data input occurs here.
Display the current psuedopage the user is on in respect to the student application. Classes for breadcrumbs are 'completed', 'completed disabled', 'disabled', 'active'. Use 'none' for default look
sys_ui_page.html:
Instructions and Information

Thank you for your interest in Information and Resources and Technology (IRT) We hire students in part-time positions for up to 20 hours a week. All positions are customer service oriented, have an emphasis on team work, and include the opportunity to work on individual projects.

Current job postings are available on the Hornet Career Connection Web Site at: http://www.csus.edu/careercenter/students/career%20connection/

Descriptions and requirements for the student assistant positions are available at http://www.csus.edu/irt/studentemployment/

  • If an area does not apply, please indicate "N/A" and, if warranted, explain in cover letter.
  • A resume cannot be used in lieu of employment history.
  • Applications and supporting materials will not be returned.
  • Applications will be screened for the best qualified candidates. Applicants to be interviewed will be contacted by email and/or phone.
  • Student employment is at the mutual consent of both the department and the student. Employment may be terminated by either party "at will" with or without cause or notice.



General Info

► If undecided, enter "undeclared"

► Example: Freshman, Sophmore, Junior, Senior

► Number of enrolled units for the semester you are applying to begin employment

► Provide previous college or high school GPA if this is your first semester at Sac State

► Enter "any" for any open position





Questions

ERROR

Employment History

Describe your complete employment history. List your present/most recent employer first. You may include volunteer experience.

Employer Details





References

List a minimun of two people not related to you who can attest to your work abilities and personal character. A current letter of recommendation applicable to this position must accompany application for each foreign-based references.

Reference





Personal History

Please list three personal strengths and three areas which might need improvement.

Personal Strengths

Areas of Improvement





Availability

Provide your schedule of availability below. Students are allowed to work up to 20 hours per week. Include a fifteen minute buffer before and after class.

Time Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday

{{timeFormatted[time]}}
